body:
Hello everyone, below is a list of users who's applications have been accepted for an interview. Please message/add me on Skype (Howsie22) in order to receive further details on the interview process.

Congratulations to those listed below and thank you to all the unsuccessful applicants. Good Luck next time! 

TinyNitai
Glitchy1
Ducksfanwaterloo
Merlinmaster
zeus449

replies.body: Just a note for everyone asking for individual feedback: I'm not saying I know this or that this is 100% true, but think how many applicants they had, and how many of them were denied. To go back and write a review for each and every denied staff app would be a lot of work, and not even necessarily worth their time, because sometimes (im guessing at least) they don't have a huge reason against someone, except that they just were not as qualified as some others, so when asking for a reason, you are asking for a reason not just for your self, but for each of the (30?) applicants that were denied, because they have to treat everyone equally, and that would take a lot of time and effort that could be put into moderating. That being said, it would also be very saddening to not get in, and not know why, so I brief explanation, such as "Lack of detail" or "Previous infractions" would be nice.
replies.body_tagged: Just a note for everyone asking for individual feedback: I'm not saying I know this or that this is 100% true, but think how many applicants they had, and how many of them were denied. To go back and write a review for each and every denied staff app would be a lot of work, and not even necessarily worth their time, because sometimes (im guessing at least) they don't have a huge reason against someone, except that they just were not as qualified as some others, so when asking for a reason, you are asking for a reason not just for your self, but for each of the (30?) applicants that were denied, because they have to treat everyone equally, and that would take a lot of time and effort that could be put into moderating. That being said, it would also be very saddening to not get in, and not know why, so I brief explanation, such as "Lack of detail" or "Previous infractions" would be nice.
